quoteFirst: Our carriage fell into the rank about the middle of Bond Street. It was
quoteLast: when we reached St James Palace. We entered the first room, and gave a card to the page-in-waiting--'Mr Montefiore, presented by the Duke of Norfolk.' There appeared to be four or five hundred persons in the waiting-room, mostly naval and military officers in full uniform, also many bishops, clergymen, and barristers. The crush was most fatiguing and annoying.

quoteFirst: About
quoteLast: , on this eventful day, the vast and gloomy shed of Waterloo lay, like the temple of a dead religion, silent and deserted.
